mapper.select: SELECT * FROM KTS_TEST WHERE testGuid = #{testGuid} AND DELETED = 'N';
mapper.update: UPDATE KTS_TEST SET deleted = 'Y' WHERE testGuid = #{testGuid};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KTS_TEST (testGuid, name, description) VALUES (#{testGuid}, #{testName}, #{testDescription}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = VALUES(name), description = VALUES(description);
